content: Given the fact that our throughput stinks due to queue wait times, the sooner we can make a decision on 003 or 004 the better. @Keith Lindsay, do you think it's still too early to decide?
@Keith Lindsay 3 months of 003 and 1 month of 001 ran overnight last night, so the runs are a little further along than they were when we talked earlier this week

We haven't looked at subsurface tracer drift yet. I don't think we should decide until we do that.

I just submitted a PR to add surface Chl and macronutrients to my quick plot notebooks (and reran them to include last nights progress). But I haven't come up with a way that I like to extend the isel_dictto handle multiple depth surfaces.

The notebooks take a painfully long time to run.
